definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: He never got to the office late, like some important officials did, and he never procrastinated on any official duties.
sentences.chinese: 他从来就不像一些大官那样迟到，更不会延误公务。

sentences.english: Prison life consists of routine. after that mort routine.
sentences.chinese: 监狱生活充沛了一段又一段的例行公务。

sentences.english: You mean you intend to sneak home during work hours.
sentences.chinese: 你是说你打算藉公务之名，偷溜回家吗？

sentences.english: It is in the implementation of the official activities of civil servants in one of the basic value orientation.
sentences.chinese: 它是公务员在执行公务活动中的一种基本价值取向。

sentences.english: It is in the implementation of the official activities of civil servants in one of the basic value orientation.

sentences.english: The thought came to him that Mary had probably fallen ill.
sentences.chinese: 江苏省公务员考试网他想到可能玛丽生病了。

sentences.english: Such regulations have aroused dissatisfaction among Ulyanovsk civil servants.
sentences.chinese: 这一规定引起了该州公务员的不满。

sentences.english: Office facilities is made up change mechanism administration to make up general need to attend officeholder exam.
sentences.chinese: 机关事业编改成机关行政编一般需要参加公务员考试。

sentences.english: It is short of prosecutive right of civil servant in civil servant system.
sentences.chinese: 公务员的检举权在公务员制度中是有所缺失的。

sentences.english: He worked as a civil servant, gold prospector, reporter, lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是一名公务员，黄金探矿者，记者，讲师。

sentences.english: The performance of officeholder assesses the core that is incentive mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 公务员的绩效考核是激励机制的核心。

sentences.english: But absolute being gentleman, today's official affair hasn't completed.
sentences.chinese: 可是神君，今天的公务还没有完成。

sentences.english: A retired civil servant. He likes Chinese calligraphy, painting appreciation and the art of tea.
sentences.chinese: 退休公务员，喜爱欣赏书画及品茗等艺术。

sentences.english: The government officer whose recusal has been applied for may give his view in writing with respect to such application.
sentences.chinese: 被申请回避之公务员，对于该申请得提出意见书。

sentences.english: He was killed in the line of duty last year.
sentences.chinese: 他去年在执行公务时殉职。

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
